lyrics.text:
’Oku mama’o atu, ha fonua,
‘Oku fiefia, fai ma’u ai pē,
Pea ‘oku ‘i ai, ‘a e kau angatonu;
‘Oku hiva ma’u pē ki he ‘Eiki.

‘Oku mata lelei, ‘enau pehē,
Ke ongoongoa, ‘a e ‘Eiki,
‘O hiva mālohi, ke fakaongo lelei;
‘A e ‘ofa lahi, ‘a e ‘Eiki.

Mou fie ha’u vave, ha’u ki heni;
Ko hotau fonua, ‘oku lelei,
Ke mou kumi teunga, ko e mā’oni’oni,
‘I he ta’ata’a, ‘o e ‘Eiki.

’Oku ulo ma’u pē, ‘a e mata,
Pea fiefia, ‘i he ‘api
‘Oku tauhi ia, ‘e he’etau Tamai lelei,
‘E mo’ui ma’u pē, ‘a e ‘ofa.
